name: Epic Pandemonium
description:
.

Epic Pandemonium is a classic run-and-gun action game with a strong focus on boss battles. Inspired by the 16-bit Contra saga.


.


In the year 2xxx, scientists from the University of Texas make an astonishing
discovery: a portal to another universe. However, something goes wrong, and
thousands of creatures emerge from it, known as the Demonium.



.


- 6 levels of pure action.
- 18 Bosses
- Variety of enemies
- Game entirely in pixel art 16-bit style.
- 5 different weapons
- Pandemonium difficulty level

100 % steam deck compatible use Proton Experimental
